title: Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream, where dreams express our reality but through the subconscious, what is happening around us in events and what we hope will happen. The dream comes from the subconscious, so when you see the dream, we want to develop it to know its meaning and importance in our real life. Interpretation of dreams about seeing fruit in a dream for a single woman and seeing fruit in a dream indicates wealth and a luxurious life, as well as enjoying good health. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fruits for a son Sirin We will tell you through the following points the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about seeing fruits. Seeing fruit in a dream generally indicates goodness, blessing, and abundance of life. Scientists and dream interpreters have agreed that fruit in a dream indicates wealth for the poor and an increase in the blessings of the rich. If one sees wet fruits in his dreams, This is evidence that money comes and goes, but it is short-lived and will go quickly, because wet fruit has a short shelf life, so it spoils soon. For those who saw walnuts in their dreams, this is a sign of empowerment and prosperity. For the person who dreams of buying fruit, this indicates To a lot of work with a large return. Therefore, anyone who thinks that he is selling fruit, this indicates a lot of work with a large return. As for whoever sees that he is eating fresh and ripe fruit, this indicates his great wealth that he will enjoy throughout his life. Whoever sees In his dream, fruits are scattered on him, this indicates that the dreamer has a good reputation and a good reputation among the people. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fruits for Nabulsi. Through the following points, we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about seeing fruits for Nabulsi. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing fruits in a dream as good news and we wish you success. Also, the dreamer who sees fruits in a dream is a sign of his marriage soon. Seeing fruits scattered in a dream indicates achieving happiness for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fruits for a married woman. If a married woman sees fruits in her dream, this indicates safety and security with her husband. If a woman sees If an unmarried woman sees fruits in her dream, it means that she will get married soon. Other interpretations of the dream of seeing fruit: Seeing seasonal fruits in a dream is a sign of joy and happiness in her life. Seeing yourself eating ripe fruit in a dream indicates wisdom of opinion. As for the dreamer picking fruit in the dream, it is It indicates privileges in his life. Seeing gifts of fruit in a dream indicates a good life. In fact, fruit with a bitter taste indicates difficulty in work. As for cooking fruit in a dream, it is evidence that the dreamer will make profit from a new source. Interpretation of a dream about cooked fruit indicates Also to a positive change in the dreamer’s life. Green fruit is an indicator of the speed with which the dreamer can make decisions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fruits and picking them from trees for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about picking fruit from a tree indicates the search for a wonderful future. To achieve goals and ambitions. Seeing mature fruit trees It indicates the fulfillment of dreams and goals

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lion in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams about a lion in a dream It appears if it is soft and beautiful, then it is evidence of abundant nutrition and goodness. If the dreamer sees a small lion in a dream, then this vision indicates success and excellence in work. For a person who sees a lion running after him in a dream, this indicates A debt that he must pay. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a girl in a dream of a lion and is afraid of him, this indicates the high position he will be in at work. But if she sees in a dream a lion approaching her and trying to stay away from him while she is afraid, this indicates that she was not Sure of herself. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees her child playing with a lion in a dream and is not afraid of him, this indicates the great success and superiority that her son will achieve in the future. Dreaming about a lion in a married woman’s dream if it is large in size means getting rid of The problems that occur in it. If a woman is divorced and sees a small lion in a dream, this indicates the high position that she will be in in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a large lion in a dream attacking her child, this indicates some problems Which you face during childbirth. You also see the little lion feeding him, and this indicates an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream about a man: For a young man to see a large and graceful lion in a dream, this indicates the goodness and livelihood that he will gain soon. But if he sees a small lion attacking him, but it dies, this indicates On some small problems that he faces, but he gets rid of them as quickly as possible. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the correct interpretation of a dream about a naked woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream: Many people think about the things that come to them in their dreams, especially women. Women worry more than men, so you find them searching for the interpretation of a dream about a naked woman, marriage, or death in a dream, to know what she saw in her dream might symbolize and to feel comfortable and reassured in her heart.Interpretation of a dream about a naked woman.Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream. It symbolizes the righteousness that lies in the human body and guidance in it. And also what a woman may regret in her life. Seeing a woman taking off her clothes indicates the presence of a person hostile to her, but this hostility is not revealed in front of people. As for a naked woman in a dream, if she is naked in a place where people gather, this indicates the occurrence of a scandal. For her and she will not feel embarrassed and ashamed, which means that she is exaggerating. . In doing one of the wrong things that causes her exhaustion. Also, the interpretation of a dream of a naked woman trying to hide her nudity and her body in front of many people symbolizes that she will be exposed to a state of extreme poverty or lose a lot of money. The interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many Of the cases in which a dream of a naked woman can be interpreted, from the point of view of whether she is known to the dreamer or not, as well as whether she is covered or not, but he explained the general cases of female nudity as follows: The appearance of a naked woman in a dream symbolizes the imminent appearance of a disaster. Or a great disaster, God forbid, and in all cases it does not portend anything good in life. If she is seen in a specific place, such as a bathroom, and she is without clothes, then this vision shows the weakness of the character of its owner and that he is unable to control his thoughts and determine the most important decisions that he must make in life. Looking To him in a dream symbolizes a general bad condition for the dreamer, as he may lose a lot of money or the conditions in which he lives change from good to bad. He may also lose a coin or be exposed to a general state of extreme poverty. But if it appears in the dream without revealing Its private organs, this indicates that the dreamer can achieve all the goals he wants and seeks, as well as his ability to achieve what he desires and dreams in his personal life. Covering it in a dream means that the person will obtain many benefits and there will always be goodness in his hand, as he will witness. An increase in livelihood and support from close people in his life.Interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a naked woman by Imam al-SadiqImam al-Sadiq identified some cases in which a dream about a naked woman can be interpreted, which can be mentioned as follows:The appearance of a woman without her clothes indicates that The dreamer will be exposed to an unparalleled scandal among people. It can indicate the emergence of many problems and crises related to the person, whether at work, at home, or in his personal life. It can symbolize the emergence of special feelings that exist within the dreamer towards another person, which will be revealed When he is exposed to certain situations in his life that bring him closer to that person so that he can express his pain

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream. In previous articles, we have discussed many interpretations of dreams that many of you have and are looking for an interpretation, and we may not find an accurate interpretation. And his interpretations, and we will publish the interpretations based on what was stated in the books of the scholar Ibn Sirin and Ibn Katheer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream: Whoever reads it in a dream or something from it, or if it was read to him, Jaafar Al-Sadiq and Ibn Fadala, may God be pleased with them, mentioned that he is harmed by a woman who harms him in. The body or his money, and after that sadness, and he seals it with love, and avoids forbidden things, and does not approach them, the right to repent. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tahrim in the MillenniumThe pink millennium has come: Surat Al-Tahrim is a saying in jurisprudence, and kingship is the service of kings, and it is sufficient. Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him, reported that Whoever reads Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream or something from it, or has it read to him, then a woman has harmed him, harming him in his body or... On his money, and in his wake, you will grieve him and seal him with goodness. Avoid forbidden things and do not approach them. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tahrim according to Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Haramah according to Al-Nabulsi: Whoever reads it or has read it, as Jaafar Al-Sadiq and Ibn Fadala, may God be pleased with them, mentioned that he is disturbed by the woman who harms him in his body. Or his money, and avoids forbidden things, and does not approach them, and sees words that were said in it, and it was said: He repents to God Almighty, advice for repentance. Al-Ahsa’s interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tahrim: It indicates that the reader avoids forbidden things, or is saved where he does not expect, or ignores what is permissible, or is offended by the words. In the case of absence, or in love with the wife who hurts him. Today, through the “Moments” website, we presented to you the interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a Salaf beating me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dream. Seeing a beating expresses different meanings, so we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dream, all of this and more details..Interpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dream can be evidence of its benefit. For her predecessor, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman is seen hitting her predecessor, this may lead to her predecessor’s advice, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Because seeing her predecessor beating her in a dream may represent her benefit to her predecessor, and God is All-Knowing. Also, seeing the advances of the husband’s mother being rejected in a dream It may indicate a benefit that she will gain from her husband’s mother, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a Salafi dream of a bride in a dreamInterpretation of a Salafi dream of a bride in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see. However, seeing the bride in a dream can be a sign of happiness and joys, and God knows the unseen if the dreamer sees A man, a groom, then this may indicate marriage, and God knows best. When you see a bride it could be evidence of an atmosphere of happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Salafi’s son in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Salafi’s son in a dream could be a sign of kindness and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. If he sees If the dreamer sees the son of his predecessor in a dream, this may lead to strong relationships, and God has knowledge of the unseen. If the dreamer sees the son of his predecessor in a dream, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the son of her predecessor crying, this may be a sign of her freedom from worries, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing mangoes being picked before they are ripe shows unhappiness in the mango’s life, seeing rotten mangoes shows bad luck to the dreamer, and not finding mangoes shows good things. Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying a lot of yellow mangoes. And keep He was very happy with her at home. It explains that there are many fears and heartaches that this single woman will go through in her life. Which will affect her psyche a lot, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And seeing a single girl in a dream that she was looking at yellow mangoes. He wanted to buy a lot of them. , but not enough money. It indicates bad things that could happen to this lonely girl. But God Almighty will save her from this matter. And if you see an unmarried woman in a dream, then someone you did not know in the dream was distributing yellow mangoes to many Her relatives. And here it appears that there are great and sad things that will happen to this single woman and some of those close to her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is collecting a lot of yellow mangoes on the farm And he gives it to her in a dream to eat. Here it suggests that there are many problems that this dreamy married woman faces in her married life during this period, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Either a married woman saw in a dream that her children were buying a lot of yellow mangoes in the dream and she was Very happy with them. The meaning here indicates that there is no good that this married woman and her children will experience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, a married woman sees very yellow mango juice in a dream. She longs for it and does not eat it in the dream. This means that this married woman will try to stay away. About some of the problems she is experiencing in this period of her life, and God is Most High. Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband gave her a lot of yellow mangoes in the dream and she was happy about that. It appears that there are major problems arising between these The dreaming divorced woman and her ex-husband are in their lives. But you will succeed in getting rid of her, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream is that she is looking for yellow mangoes in many places. But she did not find them and was very sad. Here appears the mood of some problems, issues, sadness, and worries that pass. It will be in her life during this time, God willing. The same applies to the divorced woman who buys a lot of yellow mangoes and stores them in her home and was happy with her presence a lot in the dream. Here the meaning appears that this divorced woman will try to stay away from the problems in her life, but she will not succeed. You will get rid of all the problems that face you and bother you. God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about red apples. Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is distributing yellow mangoes in many places.

But God Almighty will save her from this matter. And if you see an unmarried woman in a dream, then someone you did not know in the dream was distributing yellow mangoes to many Her relatives. And here it appears that there are great and sad things that will happen to this single woman and some of those close to her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is collecting a lot of yellow mangoes on the farm And he gives it to her in a dream to eat. Here it suggests that there are many problems that this dreamy married woman faces in her married life during this period, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Either a married woman saw in a dream that her children were buying a lot of yellow mangoes in the dream and she was Very happy with them. The meaning here indicates that there is no good that this married woman and her children will experience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, a married woman sees very yellow mango juice in a dream. She longs for it and does not eat it in the dream. This means that this married woman will try to stay away. About some of the problems she is experiencing in this period of her life, and God is Most High. Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband gave her a lot of yellow mangoes in the dream and she was happy about that. It appears that there are major problems arising between these The dreaming divorced woman and her ex-husband are in their lives. But you will succeed in getting rid of her, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream is that she is looking for yellow mangoes in many places. But she did not find them and was very sad. Here appears the mood of some problems, issues, sadness, and worries that pass. It will be in her life during this time, God willing. The same applies to the divorced woman who buys a lot of yellow mangoes and stores them in her home and was happy with her presence a lot in the dream. Here the meaning appears that this divorced woman will try to stay away from the problems in her life, but she will not succeed. You will get rid of all the problems that face you and bother you. God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about red apples. Interpretation of seeing yellow mangoes in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is distributing yellow mangoes in many places.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice and killing them in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and its killer is one of the disturbing dreams that a person can see in a dream.. The head and sucking human blood, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it by Ibn Sirin. Lice in a dream indicates enemies, and killing them means getting rid of worries and anxiety and getting rid of haters and envy. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of dreams to see sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin said different interpretations in seeing lice in the hair and killing it, which are: Seeing lice in a man's dream indicates that there are many people who do not like him, and if a person gets rid of this insect in a dream, this means that he was able to get rid of it. If a person sees lice in his pajamas and gets rid of them without feeling pain or fatigue, this means that he got rid of the diseases that afflicted him without feeling exhausted. Seeing lice in a man's dream means that there are some problems and if he is able to kill them, the problems will end. You may also be interested in: A detailed interpretation of a dream about seeing a little girl or a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi mentioned different interpretations of this vision, which are as follows: Whoever sees a louse in his pajamas, removes it from his head and kills it, this means that this person does not obey God very much and commits forbidden acts, and it is clear to him that killing an insect is reprehensible. And he tries to stay away from sins as much as possible. Killing a louse in a dream means that there are many problems in the dreamer's life, but after killing it, it means for him to get rid of problems. This vision in a man's dream may indicate poverty or the emergence of problems and crises, but if he removes it from his head, this means success in getting rid of crises. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing single women If an unmarried girl suffers from an illness and dreams of removing lice from her hair and killing them, this means that she will recover from the illness. If there are many problems in the life of an unmarried woman and she sees that she is removing lice from the head and killing them, this means that she will get rid of these problems and start a new life better than the previous one. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a white louse and kills it, this is interpreted to her that in her life there is someone who hates her good and does not want her to be in her best condition. If an unmarried girl sees a large number of lice and cannot get rid of them, this means that she will face major problems in her life. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of dreams to see a thief in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq - Nazrati Magazine Interpretation of seeing lice in the hair for a woman Married If a married woman sees lice in her hair in a dream, this means that she has a serious shortage of money in her husband and this causes many problems between them. If the wife kills lice on her head in a dream, this means for her the end of problems, due to poverty or lack of requirements, and after that they will have a large sum of money. Killing lice in a married woman’s dream means that her husband will improve his position at work and will

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a married woman in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of a dream about marrying a married woman In Ibn Sirin’s dream, in a dream there is good news for a married woman who will benefit greatly from it, but if she is pregnant, this is a sign of virtuous offspring for a girl who is afraid of something in her married life. Interpretation of a dream for a married woman who gets married without her husband symbolizes her marriage to Other than her husband, she will obtain many blessings, benefits, and livelihood in many ways, and she will achieve them in a short period of time. She will get a new job or move to another place with a promotion, and her marriage in a dream to another person symbolizes moving to a better position. Announcing the diet to righteous offspring, conveying his eye, and getting to know her. This woman may move to a new country or place of residence. But see: This woman married a dead man. It appears that she has gone through difficulties and a difficult stage in her life, a bad financial situation, and poverty. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a woman married to an unknown man indicates a serious and promising beginning, the fulfillment of long-awaited wishes, and a feeling of happiness. And prosperity and satisfaction with the family. Marriage to a foreigner can indicate academic excellence, success, promotion in a job, relocation or travel to a new place. It announces the satisfaction of his children and their imminent marriage and makes his heart happy with them in moments, and God knows best. I dreamed of joy and the bride’s wedding in a dream. Contact with a strange man is considered a sign On distress, anxiety, and sadness, and he may be exposed to illness or separation from a loved one. I saw in a dream the wedding of an unknown man and he had a great status, and here the dream indicates the recovery of a sick person or the family’s acquisition of a public benefit. It symbolizes the fulfillment of various desires and dreams, the goodness that permeates In all family members. I dreamed that my husband married an unknown man. It is an indication of the goodness that she is getting in her life and this makes her very happy. An opportunity to travel and not receive wages, a source of livelihood and kindness, and may God have mercy on him, or her husband will get a promotion in his field of work. To marry a second woman Without her husband in a dream, it heralds prosperity and a male is born, and God knows what is in the wombs. I saw in a dream that I am marrying a strange man with a good mouth, attractive, this woman has a strong personality. She deals with reality and faces it with tremendous strength and courage. She married a man who smiled at me in a dream. Her brown skin, God, represents Success between her and her husband and her success in her family and social life. On the other hand, if she marries for the second time to a man with a frightening face, the dream symbolizes her bad luck in her life. Anguish for the husband and a feeling of sadness, bad things will happen in his life. Exposure to bad health and it can get worse Noticeably or he dies, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was there. It only shows his kindness and acceptance at work. You will be promoted, appreciated, and respected. Interpretation of a married woman’s marriage to a single woman. The dream symbolizes the fulfillment of the goals and desires she dreams of, and the exchange of love, strength, and bond between the spouses. The vision announces the disappearance of worries and sadness and the passing of an adult stage. Difficulty in his life. She bought a wedding dress in a dream - evidence of the soonest date of her joy and happiness, but if it is lost in a dream, this indicates that joy will come.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hunter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fisherman in a dream, the meaning of the fisherman for single women, married women and pregnant women, signs of a fisherman in a dream, the symbol of a fisherman, interpretation of a dream about a fisherman, seeing a fisherman escaping people who catch fish and animals, when we saw him in a dream, we could not find a suitable interpretation and based on A detailed introduction to leading jurists and translators. In this article, we will understand the interpretation of seeing a dream about a catcher. Seeing a hunter and a fisherman indicates a struggle to achieve goals. A vision of fishing indicates an abundance of sustenance, and a hook indicates a bright future, but cutting the hook’s wire can indicate dashed hopes and despair. And disappointment. Interpretation of the vision of a hunter by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a hunter in a dream is a sign of success, fulfillment of ambitions, and achievement of expected goals. Those who dreamed of being chased by birds of prey in their dreams expressed their money illegally, obtained money illegally and violated the rights of others. The interpretation of bird hunters in a dream is an unpleasant sight because it is evidence of injustice, oppression, and defamation. The dream of seeing a bird hunter in a dream proves that the viewer is a wise and intelligent person who understands what he wants and desires in his life. Seeing hunters in the sea of ​​dreams indicates good luck, and many blessings in life, And an increase in money and prosperity. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jellyfish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a fisherman by Al-Nabulsi: As Imam Al-Nabulsi explained a vision of a man who is a fisherman in a dream, this indicates the abundance and breadth of life and an increase in blessing. Seeing a bird catcher in a dream can indicate sins And transgressions. Dreaming about a skilled hunter is evidence of wisdom, logic, insight, and wisdom in dealing with others. Seeing hunters and hunting dogs in dreams means hearing good news, good luck and the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hunting in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a hunter for a single woman Interpretation of a dream: A fisherman on the sea in a dream for an unmarried woman, this indicates that her engagement and marriage is approaching, and she will marry a suitable person who is characterized by generosity and morals. Seeing a rabbit and a deer hunter in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will achieve what she wants and desires in her personal and professional life. In a woman’s dream For an unmarried woman, the dream of catching a predatory animal being chased by a hunter is to defeat the enemy, expose the hypocrite, and expose the conspiracy of the conspirators. The dream of hunting a wolf in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates committing a sin and asking for repentance from God. A dream in which hunters hunt animals and deposit their blood indicates that rivalry and enmity with relatives may To cause estrangement. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a fisherman for a married woman: Interpretation of the vision The Fisherman For a married woman, this is evidence of her husband’s promotion at work and obtaining a lot of money. The dream of a rabbit catcher in a married woman’s dream indicates eliminating problems and eliminating Stress, sadness, and overcoming the crisis. A married woman who dreams of a fisherman at sea is a sign of trouble

title: Interpretation of Bisht in a dream

preview.html: Many seek to interpret the bisht in a dream, as this vision has many people, especially in the Gulf countries, where it is considered the basic dress for men on Gulf occasions, and the bisht is the main dress of Arab rulers and kings and it is a cloak worn over the dress. Wearing the bisht is not a new thing, but it is wearing it. Since the time of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and Jesus, peace be upon him, according to artistic drawings of Jews and Christians. We mention below the interpretation of seeing it in a dream in an encyclopedia according to dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the bisht in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the bisht in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is divided into two parts, and we separate it as follows: Seeing the black bisht: It symbolizes the veil in the case of the woman who sees it, as it is evidence of her secrecy. Her good behavior among people and seeing that it is good and common food, in addition to that it symbolizes the woman’s husband, father, and father-in-law. Male sisters, in the event that the fortuneteller is a man, then wearing it in a dream indicates marriage, near the beginning of a happy life. Seeing a white bisht in a dreamSeeing a white bisht in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances have changed for the better religiously. A gift of a bisht in a dreamWe can interpret the vision of a gift of a bisht in a dream In the following ways: If a man sees that someone has given him a bisht, then this is good news of the imminent marriage of the unmarried person, and good offspring for the married person, and God Almighty knows best. A man’s vision shows that a person of high rank has given him a bisht, which indicates a high status, and also indicates marriage to A family of honorable origin. Giving a bisht in a dream to an unmarried woman indicates the approaching marriage of her with a good and important man. A husband giving his wife a bisht in a dream is good news for a semi-pregnancy with good offspring. For a pregnant woman to see that someone gave her a bisht in a dream indicates God Almighty gives her good tidings of easy childbirth and the safety of herself and her fetus. Beige besht in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing beige besht in a dream varies depending on its color. Below is an interpretation of a single woman seeing a beige bisht in a dream: A beige bisht in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that a good man with a high status will propose to her. A bisht made of leather symbolizes her marriage to a brave man who will have a God-fearing bond and help her. A torn bisht indicates In the dream of an unmarried woman, it indicates the problems that she will face in the next life. Seeing a man wearing a bisht in a dream. Seeing a bisht in a dream is good and a blessing for the dreamer, and we say it as follows: A man seeing a bisht in a dream indicates a change in his situation for the better in religious and worldly matters. If the man is single It is good for him to marry a beautiful girl. The bisht, when a married man sees her, symbolizes that his wife will bear good offspring that will be pious for him and his wife. Seeing a man wearing the bisht and walking with him in the middle of the crowd indicates that he has been promoted from work and has prestigious positions. If the man sees that He has one bisht, so he bought another, as this indicates that he will marry again. Seeing the husband wearing the bisht. The husband wearing the bisht in his wife’s dream symbolizes the goodness and livelihood the husband will obtain in this world and God Almighty’s satisfaction with him.
